title: 350kW DC Fast Charger
description: Complete mechanical and electrical design of a 350kW DC fast charging station for electric vehicles.
fullDescription:
This project encompassed the full development cycle of a 350kW DC fast charging station, from initial concept through to production-ready design. The charger supports both CCS and CHAdeMO standards with liquid-cooled cables.

## System Architecture

### Power Conversion
- Three-phase Vienna rectifier front-end
- Interleaved LLC resonant converter
- Wide output voltage range: 200-1000V DC

### Mechanical Design
- IP54-rated outdoor enclosure
- Forced air cooling with redundant fans
- Cable management system
- User interface with 15" touchscreen

## Safety and Compliance

The design meets all relevant standards including:
- IEC 61851-23 (DC charging)
- UL 2202 (EV charging equipment)
- ISO 15118 (V2G communication)

## Production Engineering

Design for manufacturing (DFM) principles were applied throughout, resulting in a modular architecture that simplifies assembly and enables field serviceability.
